original_text: But when a woman prays or she speaks a message from God, she should cover her head. If she does not cover her head, she does not respect the one who is her head. It would be as bad as if she cut off all her hair.
korean_text: 무릇 여자로서 머리에 쓴 것을 벗고 기도나 예언을 하는 자는 그 머리를 욕되게 하는 것이니 이는 머리를 민 것과 다름이 없음이라

sentences.original_text: or she speaks a message from God
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그녀가 하나님의 메시지를 말할 때

sentences.original_text: If she does not cover her head
she does not respect the one
It would be as bad as
if she cut off all her hair
